column4: Hi, im new to ubuntu server concering HDDs. After a 2nd try at installing I now got a /dev/mapper/serv1-root and /dev/mapper/serv1-swap1. They are on a 400gb hdd and I want to use the hdd as a normal hdd. Aka "mount /media/hdd3 /dev/sdc".
Soo how can I remove the /dev/mapper or reformat it
bubu; tried, didnt help me mutch
will give gparted a shot tough
do you now have a/dev/sd or hd etc option?
got sda, sdb, but no sdc - got 3 disks
well, got sda and sda1, sdb sdb1 sdb2 sdb5, nothing more
and whaat are the sizes of the 3 disks? do they match sdb1 sdb5 ?
and that 400gig drive isnt the once your tralking about?
you will need to partition it
how do I run gparted in the terminal?
